use.flag: Add support for configuration files changing (app-admin/augeas)
Enable for the keyring ccache using keyutils.
Build support for ssl/crypto handling using dev-libs/nss
Build support for ssl/crypto handling using dev-libs/openssl
Build token data management utilities based on OpenCryptoki's (dev-libs/opencryptoki) PKCS#11 implementation.
Enable server side UUID generation (via dev-libs/ossp-uuid)
Build support for xar archives using app-arch/xar
